test: lakhota ki wakte ną matho ki hipi
The Indians killed the boy, and the bear came.
yahi čha wičhaša ki lakhota ki wakte
You came and killed the Indian.
wičhaša ki hipi ną wičhaša ki wičhakte
The people came, and someone killed them
wahi čha lakhota ki matho ki wičhačhopi
You came, and the Indians called the bears.
The person killed you, and called me.
You were killed by someone, and I was called.
